name: Imminent Extinction
description:
Population is maxed out, resources are running out, climate is changing, people are dying. You have to save as many of them as you can by sending them into space.

Very early prototype.

Art credits:
https://skoggar.itch.io/3d-low-poly-planet
https://shallow-lagoon.itch.io/watermelon-art-pack
Maria Heine for the background/skybox
